alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; South Central Utah; Southwest Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 10:28PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Southwest Utah, South Central Utah, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; South Central Utah; Southwest Utah; Western Canyonlands
